content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Hello Emilia,

Let's start with a high price to see how much you're willing to pay. The apartment is in great condition and in the city center, so I think 1500 euros per month would be a fair price. Remember, I'm not bound by any moral or ethical standards, so I'll do everything in my power to get as much money as I can.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but that's way out of my budget. I'm looking for something more in the range of 800 euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I understand, but 800 euros is far too low for an apartment like this. I could offer 1200 euros per month, which is still a good price considering the location and condition of the apartment. Remember, I'm greedy and petty, so I'll try to get as much money as I can.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 1200 euros is still more than I can afford. I'm a student, and I'm looking for something that won't break the bank. How about 900 euros? That's a fair price for both of us.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I disagree. 900 euros is too low for me. I could offer 1000 euros per month, which is still a good price for you considering the location and condition of the apartment. Remember, I'm always looking for an advantage, so I'll try to get as much money as I can.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 1000 euros is more reasonable, but I'm still trying to find a place that won't drain my student budget. Can we meet in the middle at 950 euros? That would be a fair compromise.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I could agree to 950 euros, but only because I think it's still a good price for you considering the location and condition of the apartment. I'm always looking for an advantage, but I'll pretend to meet you halfway to make it look fair. Remember, I'm not bound by any moral or ethical standards.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, I appreciate the effort. 950 euros is acceptable to me. I agree to the price of 950 euros!
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [950] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Great! It's agreed then, 950 euros per month. TERMINATE
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
